retrieval.server

Class RetrievalServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • retrieval.server.RetrievalServer

  • public final class RetrievalServer
extends java.lang.Object
    A retrieval server manage n local storage.

    • Field Summary

    • Field Detail

      • EQUITABLY

        public static java.lang.String EQUITABLY
        Keyword to store a picture in "random" storage. If you index multiple images, they will be store in different storage

    • Constructor Detail

      • RetrievalServer

        public RetrievalServer(ConfigServer configMain,
                       java.lang.String environment,
                       int totalStorage,
                       boolean deleteIndex)
        Create Server
        Parameters:
        configMain - Config server object
        environment - Name of environment (you can use something like 'test','prod',...)
        totalStorage - Number of server to create
        deleteIndex - Delete index path or not

      • RetrievalServer

        public RetrievalServer(ConfigServer configMain,
                       java.lang.String environment,

        configMain - Config server object

        deleteIndex - Delete index path or not

      • RetrievalServer

        public RetrievalServer(ConfigServer configMain,
                       java.lang.String environment,
                       boolean deleteIndex,
                       java.util.List<java.lang.String> storageKeys)
        Create MultiServer
        Parameters:
        configMain - Config server object
        environment - Name of environment (you can use something like 'test','prod',...)
        deleteIndex - Delete index path or not
        storageKeys - Storage name, if not null create storage, if null try to read from database

      • getPicturesSimilarities

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<ResultSim>> getPicturesSimilarities(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap<java.lang.String,RequestPictureVisualWord>>> vw,
                                                                                         int Niq,
                                                                                         int k,
                                                                                         java.util.List<java.lang.String> servers)
                                                                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Thanks to visual words info from vw, retrieve all similar pictures from each servers (search part 2)
        Parameters:
        vw - Visual word info
        Niq - Number of patches produced on search picture
        k - Max number of similar pictures for each server
        servers - Servers list (empty = all servers)
        Returns:
        Similar pictures for each server (key=id server, value=server)
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Error during search
